name: Baltic way footstep in Riga
desc: A small red granite ‘footprint’ at the crossroads of Kaļķu and Vaļņu (near McDonald’s) serves as a reminder of that amazing event.

name: Baltic way monument in Lithuania
desc: 3 crosses and a pile of stones

name: Baltic chain memorial
desc: A literal chain that links 3 stones

name: Baltic way info plate
desc: Plate with some information about the Baltic Way in English and Latvian

name: The road of freedom
desc: A sculpture commemorating the twentieth anniversary of the restoration of the State of Lithuania and invites all residents of the country and patriots of Lithuania to continue along the path of freedom and solidarity.
